item.title: LlamaIndex goes beyond RAG so agents can make complex decisions
item.description: A new orchestration architecture from LlamaIndex brings more context and decision-making capabilities to AI agents.

item.title: Microsoft’s new rStar-Math technique upgrades small models to outperform OpenAI’s o1-preview at math problems
item.description: Phi-4 and an rStar-Math paper suggest that compact, specialized models can provide powerful alternatives to the industry’s largest systems.

item.title: How Narvar is using AI and data to enhance post-purchase customer experiences
